title: Second amendment to Lease with ACL Transportation

abstracts.abstract: BOARD BILL NO. 114  INTRODUCED BY ALDERWOMAN DIONNE FLOWERS  An ordinance recommended by the Port Authority Commission of the City of St. Louis authorizing and directing the Mayor and the Comptroller of the City of St. Louis to enter into a second amendment to lease (hereinafter ?Second Amendment to Lease? and attached as Exhibit 1) by and between the City of St. Louis, a Municipal Corporation of the State of Missouri (hereinafter called ?Lessor?), through its Mayor and Comptroller, and ACL Transportation Services LLC, (hereinafter called ?Lessee?).
